backbone_arch.description: The backbone architecture to use. Must be either ['resnet50', resnet101'].

backbone_url.description: Url to download model weights from. If blank (default), will download from PyTorch's url.

cross_entropy_weight.description: Weight to scale the cross entropy loss.

dice_weight.description: Weight to scale the dice loss.

ignore_index.description: Class label to ignore when calculating the loss and other metrics.

initializers.description: The initialization strategy for the model

is_backbone_pretrained.description: If true, use pre-trained weights for backbone.

num_classes.description: The number of classes.  Needed for classification tasks

sync_bn.description: If true, use SyncBatchNorm to sync batch norm statistics across GPUs.

use_plus.description: If true (default), use DeepLabv3+ head instead of DeepLabv3.
